message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be a valuable asset and I'm happy to answer any questions you have.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $14,000 on it. Considering my budget and the current market value, I propose a counteroffer of $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our discussion.
